publicwhip.spmotion: S3M-3738 Infobase North Lanarkshire (lodged on 18 March 2009) Elaine Smith*, Jamie Hepburn*, Sarah Boyack*, Trish Godman*, Hugh O’Donnell*, James Kelly*, Ken Macintosh*, Cathie Craigie*, David Whitton*, Michael McMahon*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Bill Kidd*, Cathy Jamieson*, David Stewart*, Hugh Henry*, Cathy Peattie*, Jackie Baillie*, Sandra White*

S3M-3738 Karen Whitefield: Infobase North Lanarkshire—That the Parliament welcomes the recent launch of Infobase North Lanarkshire (INL), a new comprehensive information resource for and about the voluntary sector in North Lanarkshire; notes that the resource will be managed by CVS North Lanarkshire and funded by North Lanarkshire Partnership and NHS Lanarkshire; further notes that INL will provide a one-stop-shop for accurate and up-to-date information on North Lanarkshire’s voluntary and community organisations, and believes that INL will be a real asset to partnership working and an invaluable resource for everyone working and living in North Lanarkshire. Supported by: Elaine Smith, Jamie Hepburn, Sarah Boyack, Trish Godman, Hugh O’Donnell, James Kelly, Ken Macintosh, Cathie Craigie, David Whitton, Michael McMahon, Mr Frank McAveety, Bill Kidd, Cathy Jamieson, David Stewart, Hugh Henry, Cathy Peattie, Jackie Baillie, Sandra White, Mary Mulligan*
S3M-3738 Infobase North Lanarkshire (lodged on 18 March 2009) Jack McConnell*
